title: 20: S6E20 – "Misanthropic Motives" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three spine-chilling tales from authors N.M. Brown, Brandon Wills, Joshua L. Hood, and Jeremiah Huffman, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about grotesque growth, outdoor oddities, curious cryptids, and inhuman horrors.  

                                   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
